text: Eghtɨ dagɨar a isa Ikiavɨra Itir God ganɨngizir puvatɨzir kaba, a datɨrɨghɨn a danɨng, egh ua dagɨataba isɨ dagh isɨn datɨgh. A pura 5plan biziba ini, kamaghɨn a 6plan biziba, bizir kaba ikaragham. Egh da isɨ ofa gamir gumazim danɨngigh. Eghtɨ ofa gamir gumazim, sipsipɨn kam inigh, gumazir kamɨn osɨmtɨzim agɨvamin ofa damu, eghtɨ God an arazir kuraba gɨn amadagham.
